function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of compliance with mitigation measures such as staying home and social distancing","Impact":"Increased spread of coronavirus and strain on intensive care units","Mitigation":"Public education and awareness campaigns, enforcement of measures, support for vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, telemedicine, remote work technologies","People":"General population, vulnerable populations, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Disregard for the risk to vulnerable populations when not following guidelines","Impact":"Increased risk of infection for the elderly and people with poor health","Mitigation":"Public education, appeals for solidarity and responsibility, targeted support for vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Telemedicine, community care platforms, remote social engagement tools","People":"General population, younger individuals","Owner":"Government, community organizations"},{"Description":"Ignoring the possibility of a new spike in cases by easing up with measures","Impact":"Resurgence of coronavirus cases and overwhelmed healthcare system","Mitigation":"Clear communication of the risks, monitoring and data analysis, reinforcement of measures","Technologies":"Data analytics, monitoring and reporting systems, digital communication platforms","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"}]}
